name: BROCCOLI SLAYERS
description:
Do you also hate when someone is ordering pineaplle pizza? You have to clear it out of any threats. Do you like pizza with broccoli? yea, me neither. SO HERE IT COMES! REVENGE TIME! MAKE YOUR PIZZA CLEAN BY SHOOTING THESE AWFUL THINGS OUT! (So you can finally enjoy the pizza you like!)

You cand find the soundtrack of this game here
